name: Miami Marketing Co.
description: Miami Marketing Co. specializes in marketing communications, luxury design and promotions for new and established local businesses in the areas of real estate, finance, legal and medical industries as well as retail stores, restaurants, vacation rentals, travel and hospitality industry.  We understand how to maximize the value of your business.  We design and implement customized campaigns that deliver maximum exposure to our client’s products and services, no matter what the situation.
